idiom.sv: Nu är det farliga ben i potatisen!
idiom.en: Now it’s dangerous legs in the potatoes!

idiom: Put that in your potato and smoke it.
The potato is always larger in the next field.
One potato in the hand is worth two in the ground.
origin: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush.
notes: potatoes really do reproduce in the ground

idiom.sv: Han har satt sin sista potatis
idiom.en: He has sown his last potato.
